mapper.select: select BOARD_NO, u.NAME , BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, DEL_YN, ANS_YN, DATE_FORMAT(BOARD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as BOARD_DATE from Inq_Board ib join `USER` u on BOARD_USER = USER_NO where ib.BOARD_USER = #{user_no} and ib.DEL_YN = '1'
select * from JMS_List where STUD_NO = (select STUD_NO from STUD_INFO where USER_NO = #{user_no}) order by RS_DATE, RS_TIME
SELECT STUD_NO FROM student_user_view WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT STUD_DEPT FROM student_user_view WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT STUD_PHONE FROM student_user_view WHERE username = #{username}
